snippet: GOEBEL--Alexander "Sandy." March 9, 1941-February 28, 2004 In loving memory of our adored husband and father. Ten years have passed and we still think of you every single day. You will be in our hearts forever. Love, Doris and Alex...

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  GOEBEL, ALEXANDER "SANDY." MARCH 9

lead_paragraph: GOEBEL--Alexander "Sandy." March 9, 1941-February 28, 2004 In loving memory of our adored husband and father. Ten years have passed and we still think of you every single day. You will be in our hearts forever. Love, Doris and Alex
